attributes.action: force all companies that send us unsolicited mail to pay each and every recipients £1 per mail item.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
So much junk mail comes through our letter-boxes nowadays even if we haven't signed up for their mailing list that something needs to be done to combat it.

The best way would be to force companies the send us unsolicited mail to pay us £1 per item of mail (for every item they send.)
I'm not saying they should send us £1 vouchers or discounts for their wares; but $1 coin or cheque which we can cash and spend anywhere.

Otherwise they should have to prove we have signed up for their junk mail by their being able to provide a document signed by us requesting we are put on their mailing list.

In short make the companies that bombard us with unsolicited junk mail advertising pay for our time and effort of dealing with their unwanted advertising!
